title: ASTEC Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Programme Officer Posts
description: The Assam Science and Technology and Environment Council (ASTEC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Programme Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma or Post-graduation can apply for the ASTEC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age...
